Title(s): How the wollffe discyvyd the crane
_description: Aesop’s fable of the wolf and the crane, translated by Lydgate — fourteen rhyme royal stanzas

CamTCC599.First Lines:
In Isopus forther to procedtowchynge the vyce of
                    wnkyndnesse…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…his kyndenes maneshed hym as I fyndethis fall applyinge a
                    gayn folke that be wnkynde finis
CamTCC599.Attributed Author: John Lydgat wryten by John Stow (f. 236)
CamTCC599.Attributed Title:
How the wollffe discyvyd the crane Isopus translatyd by John Lydgat (f.
                    235)
